00021 #ifndef _CDFQCProbeInformation_HEADER_
00022 #define _CDFQCProbeInformation_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file CDFQCProbeInformation.h This file defines the CDFQCProbeInformation class.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataSet.h"
00028 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00029 //
00030 
00031 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00032 {
00033 /*! Class that exposes the CDF QC probe information */
00034 class CDFQCProbeInformation
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         /*! Constructor */
00038         CDFQCProbeInformation();
00039 
00040         /*! Get the x-coordinate of the probe */
00041         u_int16_t GetX() const { return xCoord; }
00042         /*! Get the y-coordinate of the probe */
00043         u_int16_t GetY() const { return yCoord; }
00044         /*! Get the probe length */
00045         u_int8_t GetPLen() const { return probeLength; }
00046         /*! Is this a perfect match probe */
00047         bool IsPerfectMatchProbe() const { return (perfectMatchFlag == 1 ? true : false); }
00048         /*! Is this a background probe */
00049         bool IsBackgroundProbe() const { return (backgroundProbeFlag == 1 ? true : false); }
00050 
00051 protected:
00052         enum DataSetColumns { XCoordCol, YCoordCol, ProbeLengthCol, PerfectMatchFlagCol, BackgroundProbeFlagCol };
00053 
00054         /*!  */
00055         void CopyFromDataSet(DataSet* ds, int32_t row);
00056 
00057 protected:
00058         /*! x-coordinate of the probe, m_X in C++ */
00059         u_int16_t xCoord;
00060         /*! y-coordinate of the probe, m_Y in C++ */
00061         u_int16_t yCoord;
00062         /*! Probe length */
00063         u_int8_t probeLength;
00064         /*! Perfect match flag, 1 = match */
00065         u_int8_t perfectMatchFlag;
00066         /*! Background probe flag, 1 = background */
00067         u_int8_t backgroundProbeFlag;
00068 
00069         friend class CDFQCProbeSetInformation;
00070 };
00071 
00072 }
00073 #endif  // _CDFQCProbeInformation_HEADER_
